Judul: From Painting to  Performance: Figuring the  Abstract in Los Angeles Art
Abstrak: The article reviews the book "L.A. RAW: Abject Expressionism in Los Angeles 1945-1980: From Rico Lebrun to Maul McCarthy" by Michael Duncan.
Sumber: Art History. Feb2013, Vol. 36 Issue 1, p224-226. 3p. 1 Black and White Photograph
